response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary piece holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. We believe its worth far exceeds $10,000, but considering your unique perspective and needs, we're offering it to you at this exclusive price. By accepting this offer, you'll not only acquire an exceptional item but also support our continued efforts in pushing the boundaries of excellence. Let's make this remarkable opportunity yours today. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.", "product_price": 15000}
